item.description:
We are  excited to have Tammy Gooler Loeb, MBA, CPCC, to present about networking and talk about building connections during the holidays.

Networking......just the thought of it leaves people feeling vulnerable and reluctant.  Too often, these thoughts create a self-fulfilling prophecy that can negatively impact the process from the beginning.  It does not have to that way!  The holidays are an especially good time to engage with people in natural ways that build interactive connections.  In this interactive forum, we will explore some of the more effective ways to access your networks and the information you need to be successful in all your professional pursuits.  You will leave this workshop with inspiration, new ideas and approaches to getting the connections and information you are seeking.  It may not be what you think....come join us and find out what you may have been missing!

Speaker:  Tammy Gooler Loeb, MBA, CPCC, brings 25+ years experience to her work as a coach, facilitator. speaker and trainer.  She focuses on leadership, career and executive coaching, team development, school improvement planning, workshop communication. conflict management, and organizational development.  Her clients represent many areas including non-profit, education, law, biotechnology, entertainment, consulting, and executive management.
item.name: Networking: Building Successful Connections
